message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $15,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find similar products within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $8,000 for the product. Thank you for considering my offer.
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider $13,000. This is a fair offer, reflecting the value this product brings.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking to stay within my budget, so I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for the product.
